projects.title: AI Resume Builder
projects.description: AI Resume Builder generates personalized, professional resumes from a simple prompt, instantly formatting them into 5+ recruiter-friendly templates.

projects.title: FarmAi
projects.description: A reliable plant disease detection system to help farmers identify issues, manage pesticides, and improve crop yield sustainably.

projects.title: SnapSolve
projects.description: A Spring Boot application that extracts multiple-choice questions from screenshots and provides AI-generated answers using Google's Gemini AI.

projects.title: Amigo

projects.title: Newsmania

projects.title: Ecommerce
